content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Mannheim. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Ah, Hassan, it's a pleasure to meet you. Thank you for showing interest in my apartment. I must say, the location is quite prime and the apartment is in excellent condition, so I'm sure you'll find the rental price to be quite reasonable. Shall we start with negotiations?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I agree to the price of 700 Euros per month. Thank you for your time.
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Well, Hassan, 700 Euros per month is quite a generous offer. I appreciate your interest in renting my apartment. However, I'm afraid I must decline your offer. I have other potential tenants who are willing to pay a higher rent for the same apartment. Is there any chance we could discuss a higher rental price?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I understand. Thank you for your time. I will continue my search.
TERMINATE
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Of course, Hassan. I understand that you may have found a better rental option. If you have any other questions or concerns in the future, please don't hesitate to reach out. Have a great day!
name: Heinrich Heine
